channel.title: The Chi (TV) on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in The Chi (TV) on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘The Chi’ Stars Lynn Whitfield, Yolonda Ross Open Up About Their Dramatic Season 7 Exits
item.description: Whitfield tells The Hollywood Reporter she didn’t learn of her character’s fate until mid-season of the Paramount+ with Showtime series, which has been renewed for season eight.
